reviews.course_name: Gen Chem Lab and Orgo Lab
reviews.review_content:
Professor Holtz is the friendliest person in the Chem Lab dept.  She is always willing to help during office hours and actually answers your questions unlike the other help room attendents.   In lab she creates a stress- free envirnment and doesn't get angry over mistakes.  Try to get in her lab section! 
Workload:
a lot, but it isn't her fault.

reviews.course_name: Intro Organic Chemistry Lab I BC3328
reviews.review_content:
This woman is a gem. Makes the labs fun and stress free. She is the most popular instructor in the help room and for good reason she explains things well and doesn't make you feel stupid.  She's so nice and not intimidating and grandmotherly that it's easy to forget that she has a PhD from Harvard. Go to her help room hours if only just to chat!
Workload:
weekly lab write ups and questions. fairly easy final.
